snippet: Telephone scammers have been targeting students and parents with calls demanding payments for a “federal student tax.”...
abstract: Ann Carrns Your Money Adviser column warns IRS impersonators are phoning students and their parents demanding payment for fictitious federal student tax; offers tips on handling scam calls.
lead_paragraph: Telephone scammers have been targeting students and parents with calls demanding payments for a “federal student tax.”

headline.print_headline: Caller Demands Payment of ‘Federal Student Tax.’ What Should You Do?
headline.main: How Students and Parents Can Spot I.R.S. Impersonators
